Main.Title: Esploro Asset File Processor
Main.Description: Bulk attach files to research assets via CSV upload with intelligent column mapping

Upload.Title: Upload CSV File
Upload.Subtitle: Bulk process asset files from CSV data
Upload.DragDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here

Requirements.Title: File Requirements:
Requirements.Headers: First row must contain column headers

Mapping.Title: Map CSV Columns
Mapping.Subtitle: Associate your CSV columns with the required fields

Validation.MmsIdRequired: At least one column must be mapped to MMS ID

Step1.Title: Download MMS ID File
Step1.Description: Download the generated CSV file containing successful asset MMS IDs:

Step2.Title: Create Asset Set in Esploro
Step2.Description: Use the downloaded file to create a set of assets:
Step2.Item1: Navigate to Search & Browse > Advanced Search
Step2.Item4: Select "MMS ID" as the identifier type
Step2.Item5: Click "Create Set" and provide a meaningful name

Step3.Title: Run Import Asset Files Job
Step3.Item1: Go to Repository > Monitor Jobs > Run a Job
Step3.Item2: Find and select "Import Research Assets Files"
Step3.Item3: Choose the set created in the previous step
Step3.Item5: Submit the job and monitor progress

Step4.Title: Access Processed Files
Step4.Description: Once the job completes, access your files using these URLs:

Errors.FileTooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB

Warnings.FileTypesAPIFailed: Could not load file types from system, using defaults
